name: crypo
description: A modular UI kit for blockchain exchange dashboard

scripts.start: concurrently --names "SASS,WATCH,SERVE" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run sass" "npm run sass:watch" "npm run serve"
scripts.sass: node-sass assets/scss/style.scss --output assets/css/ --indent-width 4 --output-style expanded --indent-type space --source-map true
